script:
1.3
; BS - Encounters Madness =D inspired by BigDaddy
[EncounterParameters]
[EncounterParameters] nickname = capitalships_Liberty filename = missions\encounters\capitalships_Liberty.ini

faction_weight = li_n_grp, 16 encounter = capitalships_Liberty, 19, 0.250000 faction = li_n_grp, 1.000000
